pageSetting.title: 柜员补偿业务量管理导入

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'备注说明输入错误，存在特殊字符!' where exists(select 1 from csb_tszf ts where F_EXISTS_SUM(ts.tszfmc,t.bzsm)>0 and ts.zt='0') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计年月输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMM!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMM')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'分配补偿业务量输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bcywl)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.bcywl,21,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)'||(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS')||'！' where cast(t.tjrq as integer)<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp temp set error=error||'柜员补偿业务量汇总必须小于等于该机构补偿业务量' where exists( select 1 from ( select distinct t.tjrq as tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,(coalesce(jgywl.bcywl,0)) as bcywl from gybcywlgldr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and t.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq left join nbzz_jgkh_ywl jgywl on jgywl.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jgywl.tjrq=t.tjrq where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ ) a inner join ( select tjrq,jgkhdxdh,sum(bcywl) as bcywl from( select t.tjrq as tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,sum(t.bcywl) as bcywl from gybcywlgldr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and t.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by t.tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh union all select cast(sg.tjrq as char(8)) as tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,sum(sg.bcywl) as bcywl from sgdr_gybcywl sg inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=sg.khdxdh and sg.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq where not exists( select 1 from gybcywlgldr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and hy.khdxdh=sg.khdxdh and t.tjrq=sg.tjrq ) group by sg.tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh ) group by tjrq,jgkhdxdh ) b on a.tjrq=b.tjrq and a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh and b.bcywl>a.bcywl inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.jgkhdxdh=a.jgkhdxdh and a.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=jgcy.khdxdh where a.tjrq=temp.tjrq and hy.hydh=temp.hydh ) and temp.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGDR_GYBCYWL tar ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update gybcywlgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select tjrq,hydh from gybcywlgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,hydh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.hydh=dr.hydh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE gybcywlgldr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , jgbcywl varchar(100) , bcywl varchar(100) , bzsm varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from gybcywlgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from gybcywlgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,jgbcywl,bcywl,bzsm,khdxdh,error from gybcywlgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,jgbcywl,bcywl,bzsm,khdxdh,error from gybcywlgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,jgbcywl,bcywl,bzsm,khdxdh,error from gybcywlgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_GYBCYWL(TJRQ,KHDXDH,BCYWL,BZSM,CZR,CZSJ) select cast (t.tjrq as INTEGER),KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH,cast (t.bcywl as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.bzsm ,$login_khdxdh$,F_GET_SYSTIME() from gybcywlgldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHDX_HY0.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_GYBCYWL tar where exists(select 1 from gybcywlgldr_temp t ,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY0 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY0.HYDH and KHDX_HY0.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ as tjrq,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,cast(coalesce(jgbcywl.bcywl,0) as decimal(25,2)) as jgbcywl, cast(coalesce(sgdr.bcywl,0) as decimal(25,2)) as bcywl,sgdr.bzsm from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=jgcy.khdxdh inner join csb_sjw sjw on 1=1 and sjw.tjrq=$tjrq$01 left join sgdr_gybcywl sgdr on sgdr.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and sgdr.tjrq=sjw.ym left join nbzz_jgkh_ywl jgbcywl on jgbcywl.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and jgbcywl.tjrq=sjw.ym where 1=1 and jgcy.jgkhdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and sjw.ym between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq order by sgdr.bcywl desc
